sentences.sContent: Our correspondent in South Africa sent this report.
sentences.sCn: 我们的驻南非记者发来这份报道。

sentences.sContent: I’m not a very good correspondent, I’m afraid.
sentences.sCn: 恐怕我不是个勤于写信的人。

synos.tran: 通讯记者；客户；通信者；代理商行

phrases.pCn: 往来行；代理银行；通汇银行
报社派驻国外的通讯记者

words.tran: 相当的，相应的；一致的；通信的

trans.tranOther: someone who is employed by a newspaper or a television station etc to report news from a particular area or on a particular subject
